item.minmagic.pos_binder.tooltip: Right click to save location, shift right click rune to bind saved position to rune.
advancements.advancement_magic.title: Magic?
block.minmagic.rune_envy_better.tooltip: Teleports nearby items into the bound output rune.
block.minmagic.rune_envy_betterm.tooltip: Teleports items directly underneath into the bound output rune.
block.minmagic.rune_envy.tooltip: Teleports nearby items to the block underneath.
block.minmagic.rune_materialization.tool: Grabs nearby dropped blocks and places them in the bound position.
block.minmagic.rune_killer.tooltip: Kills nearby mobs when given an item that can kill.
block.minmagic.rune_entropy.tooltip: Breaks the block that it is bound to when provided with the correct tool.
